name: 15-Minute Engulfing Volume Futures
description: Intraday candlestick-pattern strategy for the E-mini S&P 500 continuous contract. Trades 15-minute bars, entering on bullish/bearish engulfing patterns confirmed by volume > 1.5× 20-bar average. Risk is capped at 2 % of equity per trade via fixed-fraction sizing. Positions are protected with a 0.6 % fixed-percent stop and are normally closed by the platform at the next bar’s close. Designed for liquid index futures with liquidity-based contract roll.
